casebody.data:
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE
v.
GRAYBAR ELECTRIC COMPANY, INC. 153A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 18, 2019 Kay Miller Hobart, Attorney at Law, for Graybar Electric Company, Inc. Ronald D. Williams, II, Assistant Attorney Geneal, for North Carolina Department of Revenue.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of June 2019 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of June 2019."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 29th day of July 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
